column2: "That’s what Master Jiraiya was talking about…"
"No wonder… his punches were so hard."

column3: the Nine-Tails’ chakra may leak out of Naruto’s body and take the form of the Fox Spirit."

column2: "The chakra will turn into the Fox Spirit?"
"You can refer to it as the Nine-Tails’ Cloak."
"Listen carefully. You must stop it while there’s still only one tail."
"If you don’t… you’ll end up seeing something frightening."
"He’s lost his ability to think calmly and rationally."

column3: you can immediately suppress the chakra."

column2: "What in the world did Master Jiraiya see?"
"I got to see something pretty cool… Yeah."
"You did well to find us here."
"It looks like you’re still having some trouble here…"
"Don’t tell me… I can’t believe my man Sasori got beaten by a little girl and that old hag…"
"Eternal beauty that remains long into the future
"He goes and dies just like that…"
"He was too confident in that form with its weakness in full view… Yeah!"

column4: it was an ending befitting of an artist."

column2: "I see… That must be the Byakugan that’s passed down through the Leaf
"You used those eyes to approach me from my blind spot
"It’s the first time I’ve seen the real deal."
"I’d like to see how it’s different from Itachi’s Sharingan. But I think escaping from this situation comes first now… Yeah."

column3: the strongest in all the Leaf is here… you can’t escape!"

column2: "I’ll show you my ultimate work of art…"
"He’s concentrating his chakra in one spot all at once!"
"I’d expect no less from my rival."
"What in the world did you do?"
"I blew the explosion… into another dimension."

column3: but the enemy has been defeated

column2: "Why? Why did… Why is it always Gaara? Did he have to die like this…?"
"This wouldn’t have happened if you Sand Shinobi hadn’t put a monster inside Gaara!"
"Did you even ask Gaara at all about how he felt?!"
"You’ve no right to act so self-important by labelling us with that word you created!"
"I can’t save Sasuke… And I can’t save Gaara…"
"I trained so hard for three years… Nothing’s changed since three years ago…!"
